alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 09 at 8:28PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING... ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of north central Nevada and south central Nevada, including the following areas, in north central Nevada, Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County and Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County. In south central Nevada, Northeastern Nye County. * WHEN...Until 11 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of north central Nevada and south central Nevada, including the following areas, in north central Nevada, Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County and Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County. In south central Nevada, Northeastern Nye County. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
